overview:
co-CEO at DMG (DSNR Media Group)

Tsafrir Peles has been deeply involved with Internet advertising since 1999. Joining DSNR in 2003 as VP Marketing & BD, he spearheaded the Media & Marketing Department’s global activities.

As co-Founder and co-CEO of DSNR Media Group (DMG), with Inbar Chap, Peles has been instrumental in DMGâ€™s rapid expansion to one of the top 5 ad networks in Europe, with over 350 clients worldwide.

Peles also leads the technology division in the development of optimization platforms for online and mobile advertising.
